fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
Human rights and democracy related policies (EU external actions) 
Development cooperation (EU international cooperation and development)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Global Advocates Foundation is an international advocacy non-governmental organization (NGO) that promotes, supports and protects human rights, democracy and sustainable development. We aim at direct assertive advocacy, combined with high-level monitoring and reporting, among the institutions and bodies of the UN, EU, CoE, OSCE and other international organizations, national and local ministries and parliaments, think-tanks, media and other CSOs. We have permanent representatives in Warsaw and Brussels. Our website is www.globaladvocates.eu / Facebook: GlobAdvocates / Twitter: @GlobAdvocates / LinkedIn: GlobAdvocates
